lead_paragraph: A policeman was killed on Sunday when armed men attacked a prison in Bahrain, freeing several convicted inmates, the interior ministry said, in what it described as a terrorist act.
snippet: A policeman was killed on Sunday when armed men attacked a prison in Bahrain, freeing several convicted inmates, the interior ministry said, in what it described as a terrorist act....

headline.main: Policeman Killed, Inmates Freed in Attack on Bahrain Prison
headline.print_headline: Policeman Killed, Inmates Freed in Attack on Bahrain Prison
